name: Jith-Win-Yarn
summary:
Face your negative emotions. 
A challenging, abstract Action-RPG with roguelike elements. 
 
The peaceful happy calm Jith woke up with frightened, feeling something’s wrong, and found the world that used to be full of lives, peace and calm, now overshadowed with those negative emotions. The sky turns dark. The earthquakes. No traces of the world we once knew can be found. Unable to stay in such uninhabitable land and wanted to restore his happy life, even though he didn’t know what they are or how to eliminate them, he then takes a journey to find the origin of those negative emotion and solve the situation.
